statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_management;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_management WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM supplier_management ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM order_management WHERE status = 'Shipped' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM supplier_management ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, performance_rating ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_management WHERE performance_rating > 4 AND supplier_id < 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone, performance_rating FROM supplier_management WHERE contact_name LIKE 'Jane%' OR contact_name LIKE 'John%';

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM supplier_management JOIN inventory_tracking ON supplier_management.supplier_id = inventory_tracking.supplier_id JOIN order_management ON inventory_tracking.product_id = order_management.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_orders > 5;

SELECT supplier_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_cost FROM supplier_management JOIN inventory_tracking ON supplier_management.supplier_id = inventory_tracking.supplier_id JOIN order_management ON inventory_tracking.product_id = order_management.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM performance_records WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_id, MAX(performance_rating) FROM performance_records GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, performance_rating FROM supplier_contacts INNER JOIN performance_records ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = performance_records.supplier_id WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM supplier_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT supplier_name, performance_rating FROM supplier_contacts INNER JOIN performance_records ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = performance_records.supplier_id WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, rating FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 100;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, product_name, rating FROM suppliers INNER JOIN supplier_performance ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_performance.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_id, performance_rating, performance_date FROM supplier_performance WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM supplier_ratings GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING AVG(rating_value) > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE contact_title = 'Manager' ORDER BY contact_name DESC
SELECT * FROM supplier_ratings WHERE rating_value >= 4 AND rating_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, name, supplier_id FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT id, name, email FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT p.name, p.price, s.name, s.email FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.id;
SELECT o.id AS order_id, o.order_date, p.name AS product_name, p.price, o.quantity FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id;
SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, r.performance_rating, r.comment FROM suppliers s JOIN ratings r ON s.id = r.supplier_id;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, py.amount, py.payment_date, s.name AS supplier_name FROM payments py JOIN suppliers s ON py.supplier_id = s.id JOIN products p ON s.id = p.supplier_id;
